src:
Prvi poraz Ankarana
05 Nov 2019, 14:23 by Aleš Sorta

Tudi pretekli vikend v enotni primorski nogometni ligi je postregel z razburljivimi razpleti. Prvi poraz so doživeli Ankarančani, Postojnčani pa so se s tesno zmago še utrdili na vrhu lestvice.



Foto: Profimedia

Največ zadetkov so gledalci videli prav v Ankaranu, kjer je presenečenje pripravil Portorož Piran. Obramba gostiteljev, ki so na prvih osmih tekmah prejeli le dva gola, je bila v soboto precej bolj prepustna. Gostje so jim zabili štiri zadetke. Gregor Pribac je sicer Ankaran popeljal v vodstvo, potem pa so sledili kar štirje goli tekmecev in poraz favoriziranih gostiteljev je bil neizbežen.
Zmagoviti niz nadaljujejo vodilni Postojnčani, ki so imeli kar precej preglavic s Cerknico. Odločilni zadetek je v 81. minuti dosegel Ephraim Onosetale. Še več dela so imeli pri najbližjih zasledovalcih, Jadranu Hrpelje-Kozina. Korte so v 53. minuti ostale brez izključenega Gregorja Rutnika, zmagoviti zadetek pa je za gostitelje v sodnikovem dodatku dosegel Dominik Furlan. Na tretje mesto so se po pričakovani zmagi v Ilirski Bistrici prebili Komenci. Na dnu še brez zmage ostajajo Renčani, ki so po prvem polčasu sicer vodili v Ajdovščini. Zmagoviti zasuk je uspel tudi Košani v Podgradu.
text:
Ankaran's first defeat
05 Nov 2019, 14:23 by Aleš Sorta

Last weekend in the Unified Coastal Football League, too, saw exciting developments. The first defeat was suffered by the Ankarancans, and the Postojnans consolidated with a close victory at the top of the rankings.



Photo: Profimedia

The most hits were seen in Ankaran, where the surprise was prepared by Portorož Piran. The defense of the hosts, who scored only two goals in the first eight games, was much more permeable on Saturday. The guests scored four goals. Gregor Pribac led Ankaran to the lead, followed by as many as four naked rivals, and the defeat of the favored hosts was imminent.
The winning streak is continued by the leading Postojnans, who had quite a few overhead with Cerknica. The decisive goal came in the 81st minute by Ephraim Onosetale. They had even more work to do with their closest followers, the Hrpelje-Kozina Adriatic. Courtes were left without Gregor Rutnik in the 53rd minute, and Dominik Furlan scored the winning goal for the hosts. After the expected victory in Ilirska Bistrica, Komenci came in third place. At the bottom, the winners were still without victory, who led in Ajdovščina after the first half. Košani in Podgrad also succeeded in winning the twist.
